Angry contractors storm Finance Ministry over unpaid debts) - The Sun
Thu, 04 Sep 2025
From Adanna Nnamani, Abuja Members of the Indigenous Contractors Association of Nigeria, on Wednesday, staged a protest in Abuja over the non-payment of contracts executed for the Federal Government. The demonstrators blocked the entrance of the Federal Ministry of Finance during business hours, preventing staff from gaining access to the building. The post 2026 WCQ: Fans buy Nigeria vs Rwanda tickets for N1,000, N3,000 appeared first on Kemi Filani.The tickets for the Nigeria vs Rwanda at the Godswill Akpabio International, Uyo on Saturday will cost N1,000 and N3,000 respectively. 2026 WCQ: Lookman, Dessers arrive Super Eagles camp) - The Sun
Thu, 04 Sep 2025
In preparation for Saturdays 2026 FIFA World Cup qualifying match against Rwanda, Ademola Lookman and Cyriel Dessers have arrived at the Super Eagles camp in Uyo. The team now has 17 players at the Four Points by Sheraton Hotel in Ikot Ekpene. It is still anticipated that six more players will arrive in camp.
